explore.title: Explore Countries
explore.description: Discover detailed information about all countries in the world with updated data.

search.title: Intelligent Search
search.description: Advanced search system with real-time suggestions and custom filters.

voice.title: Voice Search
voice.description: Use voice commands to find countries quickly and intuitively.

multilang.title: Multilingual
multilang.description: Interface available in Portuguese, English, and Spanish with automatic translations.

stats.title: Statistical Data
stats.description: View detailed statistics such as population, area, economy, and much more.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Optimized experience for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

heroDescription: A modern and intuitive application to explore information about countries around the world, developed with the latest web technologies.
